full_output.summary: Seeking a challenging programming internship to utilize my skills in C++, Java, Python, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Hands-on experience with AWS (EC2, S3, RDS, Lambda) from APSSDC, proficiency in data analytics (Accenture), cyber- security, software engineering (JP Morgan Chase & Co), and Python (Kaggle) underscore my strong communication, team management, and problem-solving abilities, poised to drive project growth.

projects.name: Climate Change Analysis and Monitoring
projects.description: Developed a software solution to analyze climate data, monitor environmental changes, and predict future trends. The project involved data collection, processing, and visualization to aid in understanding the impact of climate change.

projects.name: Automated Attendance System
projects.description: Attendance Systems leveraging Machine Learning techniques. Experienced in data collection, preprocessing, and feature extraction for facial recognition. Successfully developed real-time attendance tracking solutions, enhancing efficiency and accuracy in various environments.

projects.name: Hostel Management System
projects.description: Hostel management system is software developed for managing various activities in the hostel. It manages activities including the student information, room information, mess bills, fee details and availability of students.

projects.name: Password Generator Using Java
projects.description: A Java project contains source code and related files for building a Java program. It has an associated Java builder that can incrementally compile Java source files as they are changed. A Java project also maintains a model of its contents.

experiences.description: Engaged in a dynamic internship with APSSDC focused on Amazon Web Services (AWS). Acquired hands-on experience in deploying and managing cloud-based solutions, strengthening proficiency in AWS services such as EC2, S3, RDS, and Lambda. Developed a keen understanding of industry best practices in cloud computing and contributed to real-world projects, enhancing practical skills in the ever-evolving field of AWS.
